<<<<<<< HEAD
The great prerogative of a private life by way of dialogue / written by the learned Horatius Tubero or The Sieur Moth-le-Vayer. La Mothe Le Vayer, François de, 1583-1672.
[16], 126 p.
Printed by J.C. for L.C. and sold by Charles Blount ..., London : 1678.
Translation of his "De la vie privée" from his "Cinq dialogues faits à l'imitation des anciens." This item appears at reel 499:29 and at reel 1311:11. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

Translation of his "De la vie privée" from his "Cinq dialogues faits à l'imitation des anciens." This item appears at reel 499:29 and at reel 1311:11. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
